captions.text: Here then, it’ll all pass. My good sir, understand this well:
It’s not dependent on anything, so there's no need…
For you to get so upset,
It’ll all pass; I swear it will, my good sir.
No matter who is hard on you, toughen up, ’cause there’s more to come,
You’ll see much from this and that person.
He was the closest of friends, we knew each for a lifetime, and suddenly it's like I didn't know him,
His place was across the hallway from mine, but when I needed him, he wasn’t there for me.
If what is gone was good,
I would be upset over its passing.
Open your eyes and look properly:
It’s better that it’s gone.
Here then, it’ll all pass. My good sir, understand this well:
It’s not dependent on anything, so there's no need…
For you to get so upset,
It’ll all pass; I swear it will, my good sir.
No matter who is hard on you, toughen up, ’cause there’s more to come,
You’ll see much from this and that person.
I’m upset about all these dreams that kept getting bigger and bigger with every passing day...
And they turned out to be an illusion; But I'm not going to live in regret, no! I’ll just look for another dream to follow.
If what is gone was good,
I would be upset over its passing.
Open your eyes and look properly:
It’s better that it’s gone

title: Hamza Namira - Kollo Bey'addi | حمزة نمرة - كله بيعدي
